import React from 'react' import { Item, Image, List } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import { USER_PROFILE_LIST_QUERY } from './../Api/user' import User from './User' const Users = () => { const { data: users } = useQuery(USER_PROFILE_LIST_QUERY) return (
{users ? ( {users.allProfiles.map(({ user: { username }, id, image }) => { return })} Stevie Feliciano Veronika Ossi Jenny Hess ) : null}
) } export default Users
